name: LUBRANIL® N 20
description: LUBRANIL® N 20 is a water based dispersion for pasty plasters and waterborne dispersion paints. LUBRANIL® N 20 is very suitable for polymeric, silicate and silicone based systems. Prolongs the open time, Improves the elasticity of the coating, Prevents from cracks and rents, Plastification, Improves the workability of the plaster, Assists to reduce pinholes, Free of any solvents and free of VOC. Our high quality wax emulsions and dispersions are a necessity for all customers who prefer working with ready-made emulsions or dispersions in contrast to a dry wax. The ease of incorporation is the key benefit of liquid products.
